Package integration

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DBconnection
    This class is used to establish a connection to the SparqlEndpoint
    Integration
    This class transforms a CSV file containing statements in RDF with LineStatement Then it writes on disk these RDF statement The algorithm is the following : Read the CSV line by line Make a new instance of LineStatement for each line Save all statements in a temporary repository Loop over all context (named graph), retrieve all statements for a specific context Check if a file already exists on disk for this context : if a file already exists : load and merge statements in this file if a file doesn't exist : create it
    LineStatement
    A class to transform statements in a CSV file to statements in RDF.
    LoadInDB
    This class aims to load timeLines files in triplestore It connects to a sparqlEndpoint with DBconnection
    TimelineFile
